definition.text: The staking program allows the Superalgos Community to compensate token holders for the sake of holding tokens. Holding tokens may be a valuable contribution that the Community may decide to incentivize at any point.

paragraphs.text: It is a very simple program, as it doesn't involve smart contracts or transferring funds out of your wallet.

You may participate in the Staking Program with the votes that you havenâ€™t used for other purposes. All you need to do is establish a reference from the Staking Program node in your User Profile to the Staking Rewards Pool. You will get a number of Superalgos (SA) Tokens proportional to the Staking Power you direct to the pool.
